title: Gold Medal, Computer Science and Engineering, Walchand College of Engineering Sangli - 2018
name: Gold Medal, Computer Science and Engineering, Walchand College of Engineering Sangli - 2018
body:
Gold Medal, Computer Science and Engineering
  • Issuing Organization: Walchand College of Engineering, Sangli.
  • Issuing Date: May 2018.
  • Credential URL: Verify Achievement
Awarded Gold Medal for securing the first rank amongst students who completed the requirements for the degree of B. Tech in CSE in the year 2017-18 by Hon. Dr. Subhash R. Bhamre, Federal Minister of State for Defense, Govt. of India, Hon. Dr. Devanand Shinde, Vice Chancellor, Shivaji University, Kolhapur, Hon. Shri Sanjaykaka Patil, Member of Parliament and Member, Administrative Council.
The Head Of the Department, Dr. Bashirahamad F. Momin, awarded me the CSE Bachelor of Technology degree.
Maintaining the topper's legacy! I am holding the college's flag with my fantastic final year thesis advisor, Prof. Manik Chavan.
